2022-10-20T20:00:00-07:00.title: Day 0 Pre-Party @ Round 1
2022-10-20T20:00:00-07:00.description:
NOTE: This event is hosted at Round 1 Southcenter. 

Mingle with fellow convention goers and NWIF staff at our Day 0 kick off party! We'll be heading to Round 1 down the street at the Southcenter Mall for games and good times.

Please keep in mind that Round 1 is 18+ after 10:00p, and 21+ after midnight, so it is recommended to keep your ID on your person at all times.

2022-10-21T11:00:00-07:00.title: Opening Ceremonies
2022-10-21T11:00:00-07:00.description: Northwest IdolFest is BACK! Come join us as we kick off the party and introduce you to our guests. Get ready to have an awesome weekend filled with music, friendship, and all things idols.

2022-10-21T11:30:00-07:00.title: Introduction to Wotagei: Call and Mix Culture
2022-10-21T11:30:00-07:00.description: Ever wonder what's going on with those specific chants people shout during concerts? Did the "Pomu mix" make you really curious, and now you want to learn more? Join ashes in a deep dive into idol concert and anime club culture and ask whatever burning questions you may have, including about whatever "yeah tiger" means.

2022-10-21T11:30:00-07:00.title: BanG Dream Combo Challenge
2022-10-21T11:30:00-07:00.description: How good are you in BanG Dream? Bring your friends and work as a team to complete a Bingo card by obtaining full combos in songs. All participants have a chance to win prizes!

2022-10-21T12:30:00-07:00.title: Name That Idol Tune
2022-10-21T12:30:00-07:00.description: How well do you know songs from your favorite idol franchises? Join SBphiloz4 and test your music knowledge for a fun time and a chance to win some prizes!

2022-10-21T13:00:00-07:00.title: Intro to Competing in Cosplay
2022-10-21T13:00:00-07:00.description: Get ready to sparkle on stage at your first masquerade! This panel breaks down everything you need to know about cosplay competitions from beginning to end. Hosted by Luluko, a decorated competitor, experienced judge, and Chief of Staff for Crunchyroll-Hime's Cosplay Cup.

2022-10-21T14:00:00-07:00.title: ELLAGARDEN
2022-10-21T14:00:00-07:00.description: The tiger. It is singing idol music covers. It is MIXing. Yes. YES. The tiger is out. (by Nael, age 6; Ella, age [redacted]) Join Ella for a high-energy performance followed by a meet & greet! Penlights encouraged.

2022-10-21T14:00:00-07:00.title: Iyashikei - The Power of Healing
2022-10-21T14:00:00-07:00.description: A short journey through the genre of healing anime, and why it hurts so good. With a focus on idol series, we'll discuss the psychology and entertainment value for this niche inside the slice of life genre, and how it deals with conflict, pain and growth.

2022-10-21T15:00:00-07:00.title: Starshine Maid Cafe Live Performance
2022-10-21T15:00:00-07:00.description: Come and join us for an idol performance from the only maid cafe based in PNW! We'll be dancing to anime and J-pop classics, with a special surprise for you at the end.

2022-10-21T15:00:00-07:00.title: Idol Costume Design and Creation
2022-10-21T15:00:00-07:00.description: From design to creation, join Project Constellation as we talk about how we design and create our costumes! We'll discuss creating costume that fit our characters, choosing fabrics that shine bright on stage, and making comfortable, dance-able costumes.

2022-10-21T16:00:00-07:00.title: Lucia's Idol Industry & History Banter Power Hour
2022-10-21T16:00:00-07:00.description: Join Guest of Honor Lucia Hunter to learn about what it's like to work at Bushiroad, the history of the idol industry, and so much more.

2022-10-21T16:30:00-07:00.title: Best Practices for Being in an Idol Group
2022-10-21T16:30:00-07:00.description: How do you keep your idol group from falling apart? Project Constellation reveals their tips and tricks for maintaining a strong and healthy group.

2022-10-21T17:30:00-07:00.title: Content Creation Q&A with RinTaichou
2022-10-21T17:30:00-07:00.description: Interested in content creation? Come ask Rin how to get started, what to look out for, and how Love Live helped grow their following to where it is today!

2022-10-21T17:30:00-07:00.title: D4DJ Tourney
2022-10-21T17:30:00-07:00.description: An exciting, skills-based D4DJ tournament! Cards don’t matter in this fun and fast-paced format that’s all about how well you can play the game.

2022-10-21T19:00:00-07:00.title:
Northern Lights Day 1
ft. Isiliel and Phoebe
2022-10-21T19:00:00-07:00.description:
Friday's Northern Lights concert will showcase our idol talent, featuring special guests Isiliel and Phoebe. Get ready to wave your penlights, pop your UOs, and go wild with wota fever. Note: audio and video recordings are NOT allowed (photos are okay!).

Lineup:

Alex Pinku
COOL ◇ DIA
Princess Kazooie
Fiona
Bunny Kaisui
FLO
Project Constellation
Jenni Bon
★ Isiliel
CODE:MiAO
Alexis
★ Phoebe
Amanda Tanadinata
Nana Asteria

2022-10-22T10:00:00-07:00.title: BanG Dream Combo Challenge
2022-10-22T10:00:00-07:00.description: How good are you in BanG Dream? Bring your friends and work as a team to complete a Bingo card by obtaining full combos in songs. All skill levels welcome.

2022-10-22T10:00:00-07:00.title: Shooting The Moon: A Symphogear Panel
2022-10-22T10:00:00-07:00.description: What do you get when you put magical girls in mech armor, replace all logic with their burning emotions, and have them sing their own battle songs? You get Symphogear! 2022 marks 10 years of Symphogear, so let's give it the love that it deserves. For fans, this panel is a celebration of everything you love about the show: the lovable characters, the ridiculous plot twists, the fist-pumping music. For newcomers... I'll convince you to watch Symphogear in the first five minutes, or your money back. (Editor's note: NWIF policy says no refunds.)

2022-10-22T11:00:00-07:00.title: Lilium Stars Presents: Vivid BAD Squad!
2022-10-22T11:00:00-07:00.description: Come watch as Lilium Stars (performing as Vivid Bad Squad from the popular mobile game Project Sekai) performs their top dances! Are you Team Anhane or Team Akitoya? We'll be dancing along to some fan favorites, so swing by and join us.

2022-10-22T11:30:00-07:00.title: The Wild and Wacky World of Underground Idol
2022-10-22T11:30:00-07:00.description: Ever wonder what the everyday business man does when he sneaks out of work early? Come learn all about the idol scene that is hiding in plain daylight all around Japan every single day from the literal whos to WACK. Hosted by veteran idol wotas (some with ties to the idol music industry) of the Tokyo scene, come learn what underground (chika) idol is and what it is about by hearing wild stories from the recollections of others' drunken adventures through the Tokyo nightlife communities.

2022-10-22T12:30:00-07:00.title: Phoebe Concert
2022-10-22T12:30:00-07:00.description: Join 2.5D idol Phoebe for a magical hour of music!

2022-10-22T12:30:00-07:00.title: Lucia Hunter Q&A
2022-10-22T12:30:00-07:00.description: Join our exclusive Q&A panel featuring the community manager for BanG Dream and D4DJ, Lucia Hunter! Come learn more about Bushiroad's Events & Licensing specialist and ask questions about your favorite franchises. The panel will also be recorded as part of the podcast series "the RePHIL studio" and available after the con on all of your favorite podcast platforms.

2022-10-22T13:30:00-07:00.title: Phoebe Meet & Greet
2022-10-22T13:30:00-07:00.description: Meet & greet with NWIF guest Phoebe.

2022-10-22T14:00:00-07:00.title: Star Tanjou!: Female Idols Before the 2000s
2022-10-22T14:00:00-07:00.description: An overview of the first 30 years of female idol music, from the 1970s to late 1990s. Let’s talk about some of the first performers under the “idol” label and some of their wonderful contributions that have had an impact in the pop culture and music industry in Japan to this day. At the end of the panel, we’ll share some playlists with selected music!

2022-10-22T14:30:00-07:00.title: Isiliel Panel
2022-10-22T14:30:00-07:00.description: Himari Tsukishiro (Isiliel) takes the stage to talk about life, music, and anything else on her mind.

2022-10-22T15:30:00-07:00.title: Isiliel Meet & Greet
2022-10-22T15:30:00-07:00.description: Meet & greet with NWIF guest Isiliel.

2022-10-22T15:30:00-07:00.title: Solo: The Power of Female Solo Idols
2022-10-22T15:30:00-07:00.description: Highlighting some of the past and current solo idols. The popularity and powerful marketing of the group format nowadays makes it harder for solo performers to succeed in this highly competitive market, but we’d like to explore the strengths and contributions of the brave and talented solo female idols in idol history. At the end of the panel, we’ll share some playlists with selected music!

2022-10-22T16:30:00-07:00.title: Trains, Ferries, and Buses, oh my!
2022-10-22T16:30:00-07:00.description: An introduction to public transportation theory, and why it's so important in Japanese culture. Attendees will also get a deeper look at how these cultural impacts are reflected in idol media and why our oshis use guerilla lives to shine brighter!

2022-10-22T17:00:00-07:00.title: Masquerade
2022-10-22T17:00:00-07:00.panelists: Kaho Shibuya, Non Sweet, Barri, Eli Ebberts, Luluko
2022-10-22T17:00:00-07:00.description: Get ready to watch NWIF's first annual masquerade! Featuring a musical performance by Non Sweet, MCing by Kaho Shibuya, and judging by Barri, Eli Ebberts, and Luluko. Our talented contestants will be showcasing their skits and craftsmanship skills. You won't want to miss this!

2022-10-22T17:00:00-07:00.title: LGBTQ+ Idol Seminar
2022-10-22T17:00:00-07:00.description: Have you ever wanted to delve deeper into LGBTQ+ topics and how they relate to idols?  Come discuss queerness in idol media with your fellow fans. Bring an open mind and an open heart!

2022-10-22T18:00:00-07:00.title: Non Sweet Meet & Greet
2022-10-22T18:00:00-07:00.description: Meet & greet with NWIF guests Non Sweet.

2022-10-22T18:30:00-07:00.title: You CAN Make Your Own Cosplays!
2022-10-22T18:30:00-07:00.description: Every great cosplayer was once a beginner just like you, so come take your first step towards cosplay greatness! Join Luluko, an experienced cosplayer and crafter with nearly 14 years' experience, to learn how you can start creating your own costumes.

2022-10-22T19:00:00-07:00.title: Northern Lights Meet & Greet
2022-10-22T19:00:00-07:00.description: Meet & greet with our idol performers from Northern Lights Day 1.

2022-10-22T19:30:00-07:00.title: Heardle LIVE Idol Music Edition!
2022-10-22T19:30:00-07:00.description: You've heard of the popular Wordle, maybe even Heardle-- now get ready to do it LIVE. Come show off your skills in being able to name idol songs based off only the first few seconds before anyone else. Maybe even get yourself a prize!

2022-10-22T21:00:00-07:00.title:
Northern Lights Day 2 
ft. Kaho Shibuya
2022-10-22T21:00:00-07:00.description:
Saturday's Northern Lights concert is a high energy DJ showcase, ft. special guest Kaho Shibuya. You'll dance your heart out in this all-night showcase of some of the idol world's best talents! Note: audio and video recordings are allowed.

Lineup:

Wotagomi
AdvanceRatio
Mikanmaru24
★ Kaho Shibuya
DJ Imouto 
AphixSky

2022-10-23T10:00:00-07:00.title: Love Live! Seminar
2022-10-23T10:00:00-07:00.description: Calling all Love Live fans, new and old! Join a group discussion on all aspects of Love Live and delve deeper into this beloved series. Topics will be provided, but feel free to bring your own ideas along for passionate, positive discussion.

2022-10-23T10:00:00-07:00.title: Idols Outside Japan: Exploring the World of Idol Culture Outside of its Home Base
2022-10-23T10:00:00-07:00.description: We all know about Japanese idols, but did you know the influence the culture has had on other parts of the world? Explore idols from Korea, Thailand, the Philippines and more with ashes, as she takes you on a world tour of popular groups inspired by Japanese idol culture and music elements!

2022-10-23T11:00:00-07:00.title: Step Up Your Skit: Masquerade Performance 202
2022-10-23T11:00:00-07:00.description: Join experienced cosplayer, decorated competitor, and NWIF cosplay guest Luluko for her tips on crafting an award-winning masquerade performance! (This panel is aimed at intermediate-level competitors, but all are welcome to attend.)

2022-10-23T12:00:00-07:00.title: Non Sweet Concert
2022-10-23T12:00:00-07:00.description: Canadian idol group Non Sweet will put on an amazing concert followed by a meet and greet.

2022-10-23T12:00:00-07:00.title: Connections! - Our Journey As Net Idols
2022-10-23T12:00:00-07:00.description: Curious about what goes on behind the scenes in an online idol group? We'll share the workings of our creative process, play some of our MVs, and have a short Q&A session.

2022-10-23T13:00:00-07:00.title: Follow the Stars to an Original Song
2022-10-23T13:00:00-07:00.description: Project Constellation is getting ready to release their first original song! Join Lyra, Cygnus, & Orion as they recount their journey to their first song "Gathering Stars". They'll share tips on how to create an original idol song and how to make your song shine bright!

2022-10-23T14:00:00-07:00.title: bunny☆kaisui Performance
2022-10-23T14:00:00-07:00.description: bunny☆kaisui is a solo singer, dancer and entertainer who’s been performing Jpop & Anisong for more than 10 years. Join her for an exciting performance, featuring idol, J-pop, and original songs.

2022-10-23T14:00:00-07:00.title: Love Live English Dub History
2022-10-23T14:00:00-07:00.description: Ever wonder how Love Live came to be in English dub format? Join Yui Haruhara for a look at Love Live's dubbing history!

2022-10-23T14:30:00-07:00.title: Swap Meet
2022-10-23T14:30:00-07:00.description: You have too much idol merch... I have too much idol merch... obviously, having different idol merch will solve this problem.

2022-10-23T15:30:00-07:00.title: RinTaichou & Lucia BFFs 5Evah Special Interview Panel
2022-10-23T15:30:00-07:00.description: BFFs (???) and NWIF guests Rin and Lucia candidly interview each other about all things idols.

2022-10-23T16:30:00-07:00.title: Closing Ceremony
2022-10-23T16:30:00-07:00.description: It's time to say goodbye to a wonderful weekend. Let's share our happy memories and talk about what the future has in store!
